name: chnglg
description: A maintainer and contributor-friendly tool for generating a human-readable CHANGELOG.md

scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle:optimize && npm run bundle:esbuild && npm run bundle:exec
scripts.test: npm run build:test && npm run bundle && npm run test:ci
scripts.format: purs-tidy format-in-place lib/src lib/test bin/src bin/test
scripts.check: purs-tidy check lib/src lib/test bin/src bin/test
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf output bundle bin/index.js && npm run bundle

author: Jordan Martinez <jordanalex.martinez@protonmail.com> (https://github.com/jordanmartinez/)
